name: retaliate
effect: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon fainted on the previous turn, this move has double power.
short_effect: Has double power if a friendly Pokémon fainted last turn.

flavor_text.x-y: The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this move becomes more powerful.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this move becomes more powerful.
